sourcesContent:
Email Must be Valid
Password Must be Valid
Password didnt match
Signed up Successfully Log In
import { Component } from '@angular/core'; import { SignupType } from '../datatypes/SignupType'; @Component({ selector: 'app-signup', templateUrl: './signup.component.html', styleUrls: ['./signup.component.css'] }) export class SignupComponent { form : SignupType={ email: '', password: '', name: '' } isSubmitted=false; userData : any[]=[]; temp=""; i=1; submit() { localStorage.setItem("0"+this.i,JSON.stringify(this.form)); this.i++; } clicked() { this.isSubmitted=true; } }
